graphics.opengl
Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
  graphics.opengl.Sprite
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLRenderableObject, JSONSerializable
public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements JSONSerializable, GLRenderableObject

A class used to draw a certain part of a texture.

Author:
John Barbero Unenge
